Writing clean, scalable code and Implementing unit tests.    Participating in peer code reviews.    Optimizing the overall performance of Application.    Strong focus on data governance and security.    Be a strong Agile team member.        Skills:          Hands on with Python for Web servicesAPIs (SOAP, REST, JSON).    Excellent understanding of data structures, threading.    Conceptually strong in Design Patterns and OOP.    Working knowledge with any of the Unit Test Frameworks     Good problem solving skills.    Attention to detail.    Should be a quick learner and keen on learning new technologies.    Strong in debugging, troubleshooting the code.    Proficient in RDBMS (Mysql, Mssql) or NoSql databases(DynamoDB,DocumentDB)    Knowledgeable on TDD.    Excellent oral and written communication skills.
